name: Tracked.
description:
For the Low Tier Game Jam #2. The theme was Survival, so I thought "Eh, a maze where you survive a spooky monster might work." and thus, this game was born. Please provide your honest opinion, it really helps me know what I can improve. Who knows? Maybe I'll update it someday?

The controls are easy, the main menu is controlled with arrows and enter, other menus with the mouse. The actual game just uses the arrows.

I'd highly suggest checking the help page, and the person who helped me make the AI, he's basically made the game work lol.

Low Tier Game Jam #2: https://itch.io/jam/low-tier-jam-2
